thread.title_full: Recommend - Review of Novotel London City South, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: IHoHongKong
title: Recommend
text:
I upgrade the room to Suite with one bed room during promotion. The staff are very efficient, friendly, and give me a lot of help during the stay. I love the lighting as it is very bright. There are two USB ports and a socket on each side of bed, very convenient. However, there is only one wardrobe without drawers, which are not enough for family staying for a few days. I suggest to add drawers and hooks for the room. The breakfast is typical Novotel style.
Remember to avoid breakfast peak hours of family stay as there are a lot of kids and you have to queue for table, and food etc, and this will disrupt your plan.
